pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw:
that is a good point that the configure.bat script now requires code from release-tools. It may be painstaking, but we have tutorials that recommend using the configure.bat script, so it wasn't impossible:

* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_on_windows&cat=install

an alternative solution would be to put the dependency list in a data file (like package.xml) and host all the CI scripts elsewhere, but I think what we have is ok for now
